about.title: About Me
about.bio: University student in Mechatronics Engineering with a solid background in programming. Self-taught, with experience in science projects and competitions. Passionate about learning and applying new technologies efficiently.
about.achievements: Developed three successful applications that have helped thousands of students worldwide.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.description: Feel free to reach out through any of these platforms:

hero.title: Bringing Ideas To Life
hero.description: At Apoapps, we build solutions that empower thousands of students and improve their daily lives around the world.

availability.supported_platform: App available for your current platform .

tri_go_math.title: Tri-Go Math
tri_go_math.long_description: Tri-Go Math is a powerful math tool that helps students solve equations, graph functions, and perform advanced calculations. Designed to make math easier and more accessible.

wakeup.title: WakeUp
wakeup.long_description: WakeUp helps you optimize your sleep schedule by calculating the best sleep and wake-up times based on sleep cycles. Improve your rest and wake up refreshed.

cetys_app.title: CETYS App
cetys_app.long_description: An all-in-one solution for CETYS students, providing access to schedules, grades, notifications, and more academic tools.

cabildo_app.title: Cabildo Digital
cabildo_app.long_description: A digital platform that allows citizens to participate in government decisions, submit requests, and stay informed about city council matters.

contact.contact_us: We can develop the right app or tool for you.
